panels.content:
# Database Metrics

Metrics collected from a Lighthouse Beacon Node regarding the core key-value database (e.g., LevelDB).

Collected from the [`store`](https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/tree/master/beacon_node/store) crate.

### Global database read/write times


The times it takes to read and write plain bytes to the database.

### Reads per Minute


The global database reads per minute, expressed as operations and a cumulative bytes value.

### Writes per Minute


The global database writes per minute, expressed as operations and a cumulative bytes value.

### LRU Caches


Effectiveness of the LRU caches for blocks and states.

panels.description: Percentage of hot states loaded from the cache (no disk read)
panels.title: State Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Percentage of blocks loaded which came from the cache (and avoided a disk read entirely)
panels.title: Block Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: Time required to clone a BeaconState from the cache
panels.title: Cached State Clone Time

panels.content:
### Beacon state read/write overhead


The encoding/decoding overheads of storing `BeaconState` (excluding action bytes read/write operations).

### BeaconState read/writes


Number of `BeaconState` read/writes in operations and cumulative bytes.

### Beacon block read/write overhead


The encoding/decoding overheads of storing `BeaconBlock` (excluding action bytes read/write operations).

### BeaconBlock read/writes


Number of `BeaconBlock` read/writes in operations and cumulative bytes.
